alert.note: Alert for Chuckwalla Valley; Joshua Tree NP East (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 4:03PM PDT by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Riverside County through 445 PM PDT... At 403 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Desert Center, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Desert Center. This includes the following highways... CA Interstate 10 between mile markers 105 and 110. CA Route 177 between mile markers 1 and 22. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Chuckwalla Valley; Joshua Tree NP East
